results.text: When all the people saw this, they fell prostrate and cried, 'The Lord—he is God! The Lord—he is God!'
results.reflection: There is no one like our God; let us worship Him alone.

results.text: Thomas said to him, 'My Lord and my God!'
results.reason: Thomas recognizing Jesus as his Lord and God.
results.reflection: Jesus is not just a man, but the divine Son of God.

results.text: I am the Lord, and there is no other; apart from me there is no God. I will strengthen you, though you have not acknowledged me.
results.reason: Affirming the Lord as the only God.
results.reflection: God alone is worthy of our worship and trust.

results.text: I and the Father are one.
results.reason: Jesus declaring His oneness with the Father.
results.reflection: In Jesus, we see the fullness of God's love and salvation.

results.text: Yet for us there is one God, the Father, from whom are all things and for whom we exist, and one Lord, Jesus Christ, through whom are all things and through whom we exist.
results.reason: Distinguishing God the Father and Jesus Christ as Lord.
results.reflection: Both God the Father and Jesus Christ deserve our worship and obedience.
